mapper.select: select a.id as "id", a.code as "code", a.name as "name", a.tel as "tel", a.address as "address", a.position as "position", a.remarks as "remarks" from oa_normal_toll a where a.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into oa_normal_toll( id, code, name, tel, address, position, remarks ) values ( #{id}, #{code}, #{name}, #{tel}, #{address}, #{position}, #{remarks} )
mapper.update: update oa_normal_toll set code = #{code}, name = #{name}, tel = #{tel}, address = #{address}, position = #{position}, remarks = #{remarks} where id = #{id}
